1.content: Who turns into a human?
1.title: Start

choices: A explosion after a battle with Eggman.
12.content: How does he turn into a Human?
12.title: Tails

choices: He had made an invention to make him human.
121.title: One of his Inventions

choices: Tails felt weird (he isn't a human yet)
Tails was turned into a human when the smoke cleared
1211.content: Tails was in his lab working on a invention.When he fixed the wrong thing and the invention exploded in his face.Smoke filled the lab then cleared.
1211.title: His invention went haywire

12112.content:
Tails coughed. "Ugh.." he said. "My head.." He then looked down and saw that he was a human. He didn't have his tails anymore.
"What the?!" he shrieked
12112.title: Tails was turned into a human when the smoke cl...

choices: Tails opens the door and lets Sonic in.
Tails doesn't want to let Sonic see him like this and lies to him.
121121.content:
Tails then heard knocking.Tails then went to door unsteady on his new human feet.

"Tails are you in there? I heard a explosion on the outside,"said Sonic."Let me in."
121121.title: Sonic knocked on the door

1211211.content: Tails opened the door and let Sonic in. What was Sonic's reaction?
1211211.title: Tails opens the door and lets Sonic in.

choices: Tails doesn't have any human clothes here
12112111.content:
"Tails what happened to you!"shouted Sonic."You were turned into a human!"

"Don't you think I know that?"asked Tails.

"What happened?"asked Sonic.

"That explosion you heard,"answered Tails."It turned me into this."

"Well since you have no more fur you will have to start wearing clothes,"said Sonic."YOu can't be walking around with just shoes and gloves."
12112111.title: He freaks out

choices: Sonic goes to get some clothes
121121111.content: "I don't have any human clothes with me." Tails said
121121111.title: Tails doesn't have any human clothes here

choices: Tails tries to find a way to turn himself back to normal
1211211111.content: "Let me go get some for you,"said Sonic as he left to go get clothes for Tails.
1211211111.title: Sonic goes to get some clothes

choices: Tails doesn't answer the door and he stayed silent
12112111112.content:
Amy knocked on the door.

"Tails? Are you in there?" she asked
12112111112.title: Another interruption (it's Amy.)

choices: Nothing Happens adn Sonic comes back with Clothes
Tails suddenly starts changing into a human girl
121121111121.content:
Tails answers the door.

"Tails what happened to you!?"exclaimed Amy.

"What does it look like I was turned into a human,"said Tails.

"Yea I can see that.At least you weren't turned into a human girl,"remarked Amy.
121121111121.title: Tails answers the door

1211211111211.content: Sonic came back with some clothes.
1211211111211.title: Nothing Happens adn Sonic comes back with Clothes

12112111112111.content:
However when Sonic returned he saw that Amy was there with Tails.She was now a human as well.

"What happened?"asked Sonic as he entered the house.

"I somehow turned into a human as well,"answered Amy.

"How?"asked Sonic.

"I have no idea,"answered Tails."Watch out you might turn into a human as well."
12112111112111.title: Amy turned human

121121111121111.content: Sonic started to turn into a human
121121111121111.title: Sonic turns into a human

choices: Sonic fully turns into a human
Tails notices Sonic was turning into a human.
1211211111211111.content: Amy notices That Sonic was turning into a human.However both Sonic and Tails could do nothing to help Sonic.
1211211111211111.title: Amy noticed first

12112111112111111.content: "Why are we turning into humans?!" Sonic asked.
12112111112111111.title: Sonic fully turns into a human

151.content: How did the sexy bat turn into a sexy human?
151.title: Rouge

info.brief_description: Sonic and his friends turn into humans

No innapropiate stuff. Swearing is allowed.
